abstract: Robert J. Zimmer, president of the University of Chicago, delivered the keynote address at the College Board's annual conference on Wednesday.
snippet: Robert J. Zimmer, president of the University of Chicago, delivered the keynote address at the College Board's annual conference on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: In a hotel ballroom trimmed with electric purple lights, this year's College Board conference in New York City formally kicked off on Wednesday afternoon with a keynote address from the president of the University of Chicago, Robert J. Zimmer.

headline.main: A Nuanced Take in the Debate Over the Value of a Liberal Arts Diploma
